signature.label: Our signature
signature.title:
FIVE MILLENNIAL
SYMBOLS
signature.description: Each frame carries within it a fragment of eternity. Five symbols spanning civilizations, five signatures of the House of Renaissance.

savoirFaire.label: Craftsmanship
savoirFaire.title:
ARTISANAL
EXCELLENCE
savoirFaire.description: Each frame is the result of more than 40 steps of artisanal craftsmanship. A meticulous process that guarantees exceptional quality.

engagement.label: Commitment
engagement.title:
SO THAT THIS
IS NEVER FORGOTTEN

manifeste.label: Manifesto
manifeste.title:
THE RENAISSANCE
MANIFESTO
manifeste.description: What we create is not just an accessory. It is an act of transmission.

histoire.seoDescription: Discover the story of RENAISSANCE Paris, a French luxury eyewear house. Our artisanal craftsmanship, values and commitment to excellence.

savoirFaire.seoDescription: Discover RENAISSANCE Paris artisanal craftsmanship. French manufacturing, noble materials and techniques of excellence for unique luxury eyewear.

manifeste.seoDescription: Discover the RENAISSANCE Paris manifesto. Our values of excellence, authenticity and French craftsmanship in service of luxury eyewear.

symboles.seoDescription: Discover the symbols that inspire RENAISSANCE Paris. Scarab, fleur-de-lis and Maltese cross: emblems steeped in history for unique eyewear.

blog.seoDescription: Discover the RENAISSANCE Paris universe. Articles on our symbols, artisanal craftsmanship and the history of French luxury eyewear.
blog.heroDescription: Discover the Renaissance universe beyond the object.
blog.emptyDescription: We are preparing exceptional content about our symbols, craftsmanship and the Renaissance universe.

article.notFoundDescription: This article does not exist or has been removed.
article.label: The Manifesto
article.authorBio: A member of the Renaissance team, passionate about the craftsmanship of excellence and the storytelling that gives meaning to every creation.
